answers.answer: Hello,It is possible to have those symptoms related to even a pre-diabetes state, although it is not common. A 2-hour glucose tolerance test will help determine if you have pre-diabetes.You can have those symptoms from other issues however, so if all your glucose testing is normal then your doctor should start looking into other possibilities.take care.

question: I am 51 yrs old 5'8 -175lbs - non smoker and have had yearly physicals and blood tests for the past 8 years and never had a fasting glucose level over 100 - my last blood was drawn in Sept. this year and that one was 84 - in the middle of Dec. I started having pain and tingling in my hands and feet - is it possible to have Diabetes and those symptoms that quickly after having good levels
title: is this possible
